typeSystemDescription.name: wikipedia-ts
typeSystemDescription.description: A type system proposition to modelize Wikipedia (and most widely all mediawiki) content structure.

typeDescription.name: org.apache.uima.mediawiki.types.Article
typeDescription.description: An article is the unity describing a concept or an idea in the Wikipedia. It is composed of several revisions, each of which proposing a content for the article.

featureDescription.name: namespace
featureDescription.description: There are potentially several namespaces in a MediaWiki. However this feature is not really used in the Wikipedia.

featureDescription.name: title
featureDescription.description: The title of the article, it mostly corresponds to the address of the content on the Wikipedia.

featureDescription.name: id
featureDescription.description: Internal identifier of the article in the corresponding MediaWiki.

typeDescription.name: org.apache.uima.mediawiki.types.Revision
typeDescription.description: A revision is the version of an article by a contributor. It is most likely based on the direct previous revision.

featureDescription.name: user
featureDescription.description: The identifier of the contributor in the MediaWiki.

featureDescription.name: comment
featureDescription.description: A comment by the contributor that describes what the correspond new revision is made of in comparison to the previous one.

featureDescription.name: timestamp
featureDescription.description: Date when the revision was made.

featureDescription.name: isMinor
featureDescription.description: Flag indicating if the revision is a minor one (mostly typo fixes) or something more.

featureDescription.name: id
featureDescription.description: Internal identifier of the revision in MediaWiki.

typeDescription.name: org.apache.uima.mediawiki.types.Section
typeDescription.description: A section is a part of the content that is structured in sub-sections or paragraphs.

featureDescription.name: level
featureDescription.description: The level of the section, the higher the deeper.

featureDescription.name: parent
featureDescription.description: The parent section, if any, of this current one.

featureDescription.name: title
featureDescription.description: The title of this section, if any.

typeDescription.name: org.apache.uima.mediawiki.types.Paragraph
typeDescription.description: A paragraph is a piece of texte composing a section, or an article without sections.

featureDescription.name: Level
featureDescription.description: The header level : 1 is the highest (main title)

featureDescription.name: link
featureDescription.description: The address the link is pointing to.
